metadata.title: CVE-2012-2128 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
** DISPUTED ** Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in doku.phpin DokuWiki 2012-01-25 Angua allows remote attackers to hijack theauthentication of administrators for requests that add arbitrary users.NOTE: this issue has been disputed by the vendor, who states that it isresultant from CVE-2012-2129: "the exploit code simply uses the XSS hole toextract a valid CSRF token."

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-2128` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

dokuwiki - 0.0.20131208-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dokuwiki package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.0.20131208-1').
